post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
FYI. If you are interested in Extreme Programming.
I have never met Scott (the presenter) before but enjoy his writings/articles very much. You can just show up at the place.

==================================
The April meeting is scheduled for tomorrow night, April 11th, at 7 PM
at Ryerson.  Note that this is a week earlier than usual, we had to
re-schedule to work around our presenter's schedule.  Oh yes, the
presenter will be Scott Ambler and he'll be summarizing material from
his new book, Refactoring Databases: Evolutionary Database Design.

More details are available on the Web site: www.xptoronto.com

See you tomorrow night.

Lawrence
post.title: [XPToronto] ANN: April Meeting
